name: add-marketplace
description: Agent Driven Development — AI-native SDLC methodology plugin for Claude Code

metadata.description: Coordinated AI agent teams that ship verified software. Like TDD for the age of AI agents.

plugins.name: add
plugins.description: Agent Driven Development (ADD) — Coordinated AI agent teams: test-writers, implementers, reviewers, deployers. Spec-driven TDD, trust-but-verify orchestration, maturity lifecycle, away mode, cross-project learning. 9 commands, 9 skills, 11 rules. Zero dependencies.
